data.why:
Planning to release a currency formatting module supporting ISO
    4127 and international currency symbols.

    SYNOPSIS

    use Locale::Currency::Format qw( currency_intl_format
    currency_natl_format currency_name_format ... );

    my $amount = currency_intl_format("100000usd"); # $amount =>
    100,000.00 USD or my $amount = currency_intl_format(100000, 'eur');
    # $amount => 100,000.00 EUR

    my $amount = currency_natl_format("100000usd"); # $amount =>
    $100,000.00 or my $amount = currency_natl_format(100000, 'eur'); #
    $amount => â‚¬100,000.00

    my $amount = currency_name_format("100000usd"); # $amount =>
    100,000.00 US Dollar my $amount = currency_name_format(100000,
    'vnd'); # $amount => 100.000,00 Dong
